attributes.action: Take down all imagery of drummer Lee Rigby's death to protect his son.
attributes.additional_details: In February 2014, widow of murdered drummer Lee Rigby, told the Old Bailey Court that she had no way of protecting her son from seeing images of his Father's death. She is not helpless, no son should see these images. Sign this petition to urge the Government to take down and ban all imagery of this horrific murder.
